name: Dead of Night (itch) (Redundacy)
description:
WASD: move

E: interact and use items

shift: sprint

number keys: select items

The game technically works with a controller, but it's untested and the game doesn't change to help you see what controls there are.

Assets from Kenney

Sounds from idk but they're generic

I don't know if the downloadable works on linux, as someone had tested it and it didn't seem to work. Let me know any different.
